褮字的基本解释

褮
yīng
古代小殓时，在死者脸上覆盖的巾帕。古人又称鬼衣。

褮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīng］
［《廣韻》於營切，平清，影。］
［《廣韻》烏莖切，平耕，影。］
覆盖死者面部的巾。

褮字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　褮； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1122第29
【唐韻】於營切【集韻】娟營切，?音縈。【說文】鬼衣也。　又汙莖切，音甖。義同。　又元扃切，音螢。【爾雅·釋器】袕謂之褮。　又【類篇】縈定切，音鎣。衣襉也。

褮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
褮字的起名意思

暂无。

Praise
Basic explanation of words
Praise
yīng
A scarf covering the face of the deceased in the ancient mortuary. The ancients also called ghost clothes.
Praise
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīng］
["Guangyun" Yu Yingqie, Pingqing, and shadow. ]
["Guangyun" black stems are cut, ploughed, and shadowed. ]
A towel covering the face of the deceased.
Praise
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　褮; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1122 29
[Tang Yun] Yu Yingqie [Jiyun] Juan Yingqie,? Yin Ying. [Said the text] Ghost clothing also.　 Cut the dirty stem again, sound poppy. The same meaning.　Yon Motoki, Oto Firefly. 【Erya·Release Device】Zhi is called "Zhi".　[Classes] Ying Dingqi, Yin Ying. Clothing also.
